pet.name: Feathered Fun Box
pet.information: The Feathered Fun Box is a themed subscription box perfect for your bird companion.  Boxes include toys, snacks, and parrot products carefully selected by our team to bring you and your bird joy.  Choose from two box types: Small birds and Large birds.  The following prices is for small birds.  A monthly subscription is $49.98 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $47 a month, totaling $141, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $45 a month, totaling $270, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $43 a month, totaling $516, once a year.  For more information, go to www.featheredfunbox.com.
pet.paragraph1: The Feathered Fun Box is a themed subscription box perfect for your bird companion.  Boxes include toys, snacks, and parrot products carefully selected by our team to bring you and your bird joy.  Choose from two box types: Small birds and Large birds.
pet.paragraph2:
Price List
Monthly: $49.98/month
3-Month: $47/month = $141 - 4 times a year
6-Month: $45/month = $270 - twice a year
Annual: $43/month = $516 - once a year

box of the week.name: Vices
box of the week.information: Vices is a membership program centered on a monthly delivery of storied treasures.  Every month brings a fresh collection of incredible products and experiences that have been curated for your enjoyment.  A monthly subscription is $129.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $119.95, totaling $359.85, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $109.95, totaling $659.70, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $99.95 a month, totaling $1199.40, once a year.  For more information, go to vices.com.

male-baby.name: My TOT Box
male-baby.information: Each Tot Box includes unique baby products specially curated for babies by parents and grandparents.  They also make great baby shower gifts for new moms and expecting parents.  For 1 box over 3 months, it's $49.95 every 3 months.  For 2 boxes over 6 months, it's $47.46 a box, totaling $94.92, twice a year.  For 4 boxes over 12 months, it's $42.46 a box, totaling $169.84, once a year.  For more information, go to mytotbox.com.

Two boxes over 6 months: $47.46/box = $94.92 - twice a year
Four boxes over 12 months: $42.46/box = $169.84 - once a year

male-child.name: Paletteful Packs
male-child.information: Paletteful Packs is a monthly art subscription service that wants to bring the best art supplies to you, no matter your age or skill level! Every box includes everything you need to create a work of art.  A monthly subscription is $24.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $24.45 a month, totaling $73.35, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $23.95 a month, totaling $143.70, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $22.95 a month, totaling $275.40, once a year.  For more information, go to www.palettefulpacks.com.

male-teen.name: SnackSack
male-teen.information: At SnackSack, we're kicking unhealthy snacks to the curb.  Each monthly collection of smarter snacking is carefully curated from 11 to 15 amazing brands.  Choose from 4 Snacking plans: Classic, Vegan, Gluten-Free, and Workplace.  The following prices are for the Classic plan.  A monthly subscription is $23.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $23.58 a month, totaling $70.74, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $23.17 a month, totaling $139.02, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $22.67 a month, totaling $272.04, once a year.  For more information, go to www.snacksack.com.

male-adult.name: Cloth and Paper
male-adult.information: Appreciating the finer things should not stop with your desk supplies! Cloth and Paper offers a wide range of fancy pens, stationary, and planning goodies.  Choose from the Penspiration box, the Planner Stationery Box, or the Penspiration and Planner Stationary box.  The prices given are all for the Penspiration box.  A monthly subscription is $18 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $16.33 a month, totaling $48.99, four times a year.  For more information, go to www.clothandpaper.com.
male-adult.paragraph1: Appreciating the finer things should not stop with your desk supplies! Cloth and Paper offers a wide range of fancy pens, stationary, and planning goodies.  Choose from the Penspiration box, the Planner Stationery Box, or the Penspiration and Planner Stationary box.

female-baby.name: Smart and Sleepy
female-baby.information: Smart and Sleepy provides customers with the perfect combination of goodies for their most prized possession - children!  Each month customers will receive a pair of our unique, all-organic, eco-friendly pajamas as well as two children's books and discount codes to our sister store - Winnie James Boutique.  A monthly subscription is $45 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $40 a month, totaling $120, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $35, totaling $210, twice a year.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.

female-child.name: Find Your Wings by Fashion Angels
female-child.information: Fashion Angels has always challenged Tweens to "Find Your Wings".  Packed with over $80 in craft activities, both, beauty and on trend fashion accessories.  The quarterly craft box feature 9 full size craft kits with a retail value of over $110!  A monthly subscription is $30 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $28 a month, totaling $84, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $25 a month, totaling $150, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $22 a month, totaling $264, once a year.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.

female-teen.name: Nail Shack
female-teen.information: Your NAILShack pack will include at least 4 full sets of high quality, easy to apply nail polish strips delivered to your door every month.  Plus a fun nail file and a gentle cuticle pusher for easy flawless application.  A monthly subscription is $12.96 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $10.32 a month, totaling $30.95, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $9.95 a month, totaling $59.70, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $9.95 a month, totaling $119.40, once a year.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.

female-adult.name: Introverts Retreat
female-adult.information: Admit it - you'd rather avoid other people and spend the day alone.  That's why we created Introverts Retreat.  Choose from the Read Box, the Read and Relax Box, or the Read, Relax, and Recharge Box.  Then choose your book type, beverage flavor, and scent.  For the Read Box, it's $14.99 a month.  For the Read and Relax box, it's $20.99 a month.  For the Read, Relax, and Recharge box, it's $36.99 a month.  For more information, go to www.introvertsretreatbox.com.

neutral-baby.name: My First Reading Club
neutral-baby.information: My First Reading Club is guided by a passion for reading.  Reading inspires, empowers, and links to all education throughout life.  With 5 distinct age groups, choose which ever fits best.  A monthly subscription is $19.99 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $19.00 a month, totaling $57, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $17.99, totaling $107.94, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $16.99 a month, totaling $203.88, once a year.  For more information, go to www.myfirstreadingclub.com.

neutral-child.name: The Preschool Box
neutral-child.information: Help your preschooler or kindergartener start school off with a bang! The Preschool Box is full of fun, simple activities that will have your child excited to learn.  You can choose a box for 1, 2, or 3 children.  The following price list is for one child.  A monthly subscription is $32.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $31.65 a month, totaling $94.95, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $30.83 a month, totaling $184.98, two times a year.  An annual subscription is $29.16 a month, totaling $349.92, once a year.  For more information, go to www.preschoolbox.com.

neutral-teen.name: The Plant Club
neutral-teen.information: Fall in love with a new houseplant variety every month from The Plant Club.  We curate more than cute collections of pots and accessories, we lovingly pack everything you need to easily assemble and care for your own living decor.  A monthly subscription is $24.95 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $24.65 a month, totaling $73.95, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $24.33 a month, totaling $145.98, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $23.33 a month, totaling $279.96, once a year.  For more information, go to www.theplantclub.com.

neutral-adult.name: The Adults and Crafts Crate
neutral-adult.information: Adults and Crafts is a thoughtfully curated craft subscription box with all the tools, material, and instructions included!  A monthly subscription is $33 a month.  A three-month pre-paid subscription is $32 a month, totaling $96, four times a year.  A six-month pre-paid subscription is $31 a month, totaling $186 a month, twice a year.
